definitions.definition: The act of deflecting or something deflected .
examples: Russell's goalbound shot took a deflection off a defender and went out for a corner.

definitions.definition: Deviation (of a needle or other indicator or mechanism ) from a previous position .
The act of refusing to address something (questions, criticism, etc.).
The act of denying accountability by redirecting blame elsewhere.
A tactic that forces an opposing piece to leave the square , rank or file it occupies , thus exposing the king or a valuable piece

main_definition: The act of deflecting or something deflected .
secondary_definitions: Deviation (of a needle or other indicator or mechanism ) from a previous position .
( figuratively ) The act of refusing to address something (questions, criticism, etc.).
( psychology ) The act of denying accountability by redirecting blame elsewhere.
( chess ) A tactic that forces an opposing piece to leave the square , rank or file it occupies , thus exposing the king or a valuable piece
